showScoreExcerpt:
"As the production opens at the St. James Theatre, it becomes the third rendering of Into the Woods on Broadway, and the only one not directed by its author, Lapine. The text is ripe for mining; there’s so much to explore in it that is often just overlooked in service to the plotting...But here they have a second chance and it doesn’t feel like much has been deepened or enriched in its new digs."
